services.name: Take in from sides
services.description: Reduces the width of the dress through the side seams to tighten either the bust, waist or legs this can be altered by a maximum of 2 inches. Ideal for jumpsuits that are too loose or an unflattering fit.

questions.question: Where would you like your dress taking in?
questions.explainer: We can taper based on which area of your dress is loose

services.name: Shorten
services.description: Reduces the length of your dress from the hem while maintaining the original finish and shape where possible. Please select a premium service for dresses with delicate fabrics as these require extra time and care from our tailors. Please be aware that any original vent features (i.e. openings at the back of the dress) can not be replicated with this service.

questions.question: Does your dress have any unique details?
questions.explainer: Does your dress have sequins, pleats, zips or any details that will need to be removed and re-attached to complete this?

subservices.name: Shorten denim dress original finish
subservices.description: Reduces the length of your dress with an original finish where the hem is reattached with a seam and binded back on. This finish is recommend where the hem has detailing you would like to keep.

subservices.name: Shorten denim dress plain finish
subservices.description: Reduces the length of your dress with a plain finish where the hem is folded and stitched with a close matching thread to the original. This finish is recommend on plain coloured (i.e white, red, black etc), patterned denim.

services.name: Up-size
services.description: Increases the width of your dress by adding panel as the sides of the area you would like loosening.

questions.question: Where would you like to up-size your dress?
questions.explainer: We can up-size from the bust to waist or whole length of the dress

services.name: Lengthen
services.description: Extending the length, using the existing seam allowance or adding a panel to the hem.

questions.question: Is there seam allowance at the hem?
questions.explainer: If the hem is folded and finished with a top stitch there is usually about an inch seam allowance to use.

subservices.name: Add panel to hem
subservices.description: We can lengthen by as much as you would like by adding a panel of fabric at any length you would like

questions.question: What material would you like for the panel?
questions.explainer: We can either use material you supply or use what we have in the studio. This can be a close match in terms of material colour and fabric or a contrast colour.

option.answer: Use a SOJO sourced close match material
Use a SOJO sourced black material

subservices.name: Lengthen using existing seam allowance
subservices.description: We can discretely increase the lengthen by using the existing seam allowance. We can only lengthen as much as the seam allowance gives this is usually MAX AN INCH. There is often small holes where the previous stitch line was but these will fade with wear and washes.

questions.question: Are your straps embellished?
questions.explainer: Do your straps have sequins, chaining or beading? Embellishment often requires removing and re-attaching and extra care and time is required to complete shortenings.

services.name: Shorten sleeves
services.description: Alters the sleeve length while maintaining the original style where possible. Our tailors will shorten from either the cuff or the shoulder, depending on the top finish and sleeve details.

questions.question: Do your sleeves have any unique details you would like re-creating?
questions.explainer: If your sleeves have trims, embellishment, zips or buttons you would like re-attaching or re-creating

services.name: Remove sleeves
services.description: Involves cutting off or detaching the existing sleeves with a clean hem finish. Ideal for converting a top into a sleeveless style.

questions.question: How many holes/ rips would you like fixing?
What is the size of the rip/s / holes?
questions.explainer: Please give the average size of the holes or rips when there are varying sizes. Please measure from the widest part.

subservices.name: Visible darning
subservices.description: We will use yarn or thin thread depending on the material of your garment we match the yarn as close as possible to the original colour and darn the hole. However this is not an invisible mend and like for like is not guaranteed

subservices.name: Patch
subservices.description: We can create a discreet patch using excess material from the inner part of the sleeve or pockets. Or alternatively we can use a close match material if there is not excess material in your garment.

subservices.name: Create discrete seam
subservices.description: We can pull the rip/ hole into a small seam leaving a small line where the material has been taken in to find the damage.

subservices.name: Fix rip along seam
subservices.description: Repairs a single tear or damage along a seam, where the pieces of fabric are stitched together. Ideal for small rips caused by snagging or wear and tear to maintain the structural integrity of your garment. In some cases depending on the damage we will need to take in the fabric to ensure a clean new durable seam, this can slightly alter the fit of the original skirt shape.

value.filename: brown skirt rip along seam by zip.webp
value.url: /api/media/file/brown skirt rip along seam by zip.webp

services.name: Zip replacement
services.description: Ideal for when your zipper is damaged, stuck or no longer functions correctly. We have a stock of standard zips and can not guarantee an exact match to the original.

questions.question: How many buttons would you like replacing?
How many buttons would you like replacing?

services.name: Fix loose stitching
services.description: Repairs seams or stitches that have come undone or are loose. Ideal for when the thread holding the fabric together is damaged, loose, or has unraveled.

services.name: Fix pocket
services.description: We can repair a hole in the pocket bag fix a rip along the seam of the pocket or fix the outside pocket bag.

questions.question: Which part of your pocket is damaged?

option.answer: Rip around the outside of the pocket

questions.question: Would you like the pocket replaced or a rip/ holes fixed?

services.name: Fix broken strap
services.description: Repairs a damaged or broken strap while maintaining the original style of the dress.

subservices.name: Replacing sequins or beading
subservices.description: the replacemnet will be with similar beadings/sequins- like for like is not guaranteed

questions.question: How large is the area of sequins you would replacing?

questions.question: How many buttons would you like replacing?
How many buttons would you like replacing?

services.name: Fix loose stitching
services.description: Repairs seams or stitches that have come undone or are loose. Ideal for when the thread holding the fabric together is damaged, loose, or has unraveled.

services.name: Fix pocket
services.description: We can repair a hole in the pocket bag fix a rip along the seam of the pocket or fix the outside pocket bag.

questions.question: Which part of your pocket is damaged?

option.answer: Rip around the outside of the pocket

questions.question: Would you like the pocket replaced or a rip/ holes fixed?

services.name: Fix broken strap
services.description: Repairs a damaged or broken strap while maintaining the original style of the dress.

subservices.name: Replacing sequins or beading
subservices.description: the replacemnet will be with similar beadings/sequins- like for like is not guaranteed

questions.question: How large is the area of sequins you would replacing?
